name: UISceneActivationConditions
desc: The set of conditions that define when UIKit activates the current scene.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new activation conditions object.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Restores an activation conditions object from the specified archive.

items.name: var prefersToActivateForTargetContentIdentifierPredicate: NSPredicate
items.desc: The set of conditions for which UIKit chooses to activate this scene over others.

items.name: var canActivateForTargetContentIdentifierPredicate: NSPredicate
items.desc: Conditions for which UIKit can activate the scene if a better alternative doesn't exist.
